hotels.title: Beachfront Thailand Island Paradise on Koh Phangan
hotels.description: The emerald waters, white sands and tropical jungle of Thailand’s Koh Phangan island await you at Buri Rasa Village Phangan. Nestled on the island’s northeast coast, this award-winning resort (rated among the top 1% worldwide on Tripadvisor) offers barefoot boutique style just steps from the beach. Indulge in authentic Thai and barbecue flavours overlooking the waves at The Beach Club, snorkel the colourful coral reef and submit to complete relaxation at Nam Thai Herbal Spa. While away the evenings at the resort’s charming village square, a cobblestoned street where you can enjoy a candlelit drink to the sounds of the ocean, or browse traditional Thai boutiques. Ready to explore? The resort offers excursions so you can immerse yourself in the beauty of the island. Don't miss sunset on Mae Haad Beach, the waterfalls and treks in Namtok Than Sadet National Park or the fantastic snorkelling at Haad Khom Beach.
